title: WATCH: These are the top 5 markets to shop at in Africa
text:
If you're looking for the very best art, produce or cultural markets you have come to the right place! From the Makola Market in Ghana to the Khan el Khalili in Egypt, you're sure to find the perfect markets for you!

REAL: 4 cities, 4 markets, 4 rules: How to haggle your way to a good bargain

Get ready to haggle, catch a few bargains and scratch your way to some of the best local produce and products on offers.
